txt.en: You have found strange flowers in the planters in the Circle of Madness. Who planted them here?

You show Faeron the strange flowers you have gathered from the Circle of Madness.\n\n'You were right to note these as out-of-place, [placeholder]. These are some of the same strange plants we discovered in Agarnaith. It can be no accident they have found their way here; the merrevail may have brought them and transplanted them on purpose. For what reason, I am unsure. Perhaps they are a component of the plague. We will be sure to destroy any more we find in the Circle of Madness.'
Strange flowers can be found in the planters in the Circle of Madness.\n\nYou should collect strange flowers.
Faeron is stationed inside Barad Elenath, the Star-gazers' Spire.\n\nYou should talk to Faeron.

You have found a strange flower growing among the planters in the Circle of Madness. They look slightly out of place. Were these planted by Gothmog's cultists or by the merrevail? It would be prudent to collect more and show them to the Rangers.
